title: SWGOH StackRank Character Base Data Schema
description: Schema validation for Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes character tier ranking data

characterBaseData.description: Array of character tier ranking configurations

character.description: Individual character tier and synergy configuration

id.description: Unique character identifier (uppercase, may contain underscores and numbers)

baseTier.description: Base tier ranking (1-19, where 1 is highest/best)

synergySets.description: Optional array of synergy configurations that can improve tier placement

requiresAllZetas.description: Optional flag indicating if all zeta abilities must be unlocked

requiredZetas.description: Optional array of required zeta ability identifiers (only used when requiresAllZetas is false, can be empty)

requiresAllOmicrons.description: Optional flag indicating if all omicron abilities must be unlocked

requiredOmicrons.description: Optional array of required omicron ability identifiers (only used when requiresAllOmicrons is false, can be empty)

ignoreSynergyRequirements.description: Optional flags to ignore specific synergy requirements

ignoreRequirements.description: Optional flags to ignore specific requirements

synergySet.description: Synergy configuration that reduces effective tier when conditions are met

synergyEnhancement.description: Tier improvement value when synergy conditions are met (0-10)

synergyEnhancementOmicron.description: Additional tier improvement when omicron is applied (0-10)

characters.description: Optional list of specific character IDs that trigger this synergy

skipIfPresentCharacters.description: Optional list of character IDs that prevent this synergy from activating if present on the team

categoryDefinitions.description: Optional array of category-based synergy requirements

requiresAllZetas.description: Optional flag indicating if all zeta abilities must be unlocked for this synergy

requiredZetas.description: Optional array of required zeta ability identifiers for this synergy (only used when requiresAllZetas is false, can be empty)

categoryDefinition.description: Category-based matching criteria for synergy activation

include.description: Array of category tags that must be matched (e.g., 'Jedi', 'Galactic Republic')

exclude.description: Optional array of category tags to exclude from matching

numberMatchesRequired.description: Number of team members that must match the include criteria
